articles.title: –ù–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫–µ –º–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—è –¥–ª—è –∑–∞–∫–æ—Ö–∞–Ω–∏—Ö: –Ø–∫ –∑–≤—É—á–∞—Ç–∏ —è–∫ —Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∂–Ω—ñ–π –Ω–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∂–µ—Ü—å –∑ –≤–∞—à–æ—é –ø–∞—Ä–æ—é
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import ConjugationTable from '@components/ConjugationTable.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

–ü–æ—á–∏–Ω–∞—î—Ç–µ –≤–∏–≤—á–∞—Ç–∏ –Ω–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫—É –∑ –≤–∞—à–æ—é –ø–∞—Ä–æ—é? –ü—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞ –≤–∏–º–æ–≤–∞ ‚Äî —Ü–µ –∫–ª—é—á –¥–æ —Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∂–Ω—å–æ–≥–æ –∑–≤'—è–∑–∫—É –∑ –≤–∞—à–∏–º –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–º —Ç–∞ –π–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ–¥–∏–Ω–æ—é. –ö–æ–ª–∏ –≤–∏ –≤–∏–º–æ–≤–ª—è—î—Ç–µ –Ω–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫—ñ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞ –∑ –ª—é–±–æ–≤'—é —Ç–∞ –≤–ø–µ–≤–Ω–µ–Ω—ñ—Å—Ç—é, —Ü–µ —Å—Ç–≤–æ—Ä—é—î –æ—Å–æ–±–ª–∏–≤—É —ñ–Ω—Ç–∏–º–Ω—ñ—Å—Ç—å —É –≤–∞—à–∏—Ö —Ä–æ–∑–º–æ–≤–∞—Ö. –î–æ –∫—ñ–Ω—Ü—è —Ü—ñ—î—ó —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—Ç—ñ –≤–∏ –∑–º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –≤–∏–º–æ–≤–ª—è—Ç–∏ [—Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–Ω—ñ –Ω–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫—ñ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏](/learn/uk/no/romantic-norwegian-phrases-for-couples/) —Ç–∞–∫, —â–æ –≤–∞—à –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä –±—É–¥–µ –≤ –∑–∞—Ö–≤–∞—Ç—ñ!

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Jeg elsker deg"
  translation="–Ø —Ç–µ–±–µ –∫–æ—Ö–∞—é"
  pronunciation="YAI el-sher dai"
  context="–ù–∞–π–≤–∞–∂–ª–∏–≤—ñ—à–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∞ –¥–ª—è –∫–æ–∂–Ω–æ—ó –ø–∞—Ä–∏ ‚Äî –≤–∏–≤—á—ñ—Ç—å —ó—ó –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ!"
/>

## –ß–æ–º—É –Ω–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫–∞ –≤–∏–º–æ–≤–∞ –æ—Å–æ–±–ª–∏–≤–∞ –¥–ª—è –ø–∞—Ä

–ù–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫–∞ –º–æ–≤–∞ –º–∞—î –º–µ–ª–æ–¥—ñ–π–Ω–∏–π, –º–∞–π–∂–µ –º—É–∑–∏—á–Ω–∏–π —Ä–∏—Ç–º, —è–∫–∏–π —ñ–¥–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ –ø—ñ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –¥–ª—è —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–Ω–∏—Ö —Ä–æ–∑–º–æ–≤. –ù–∞ –≤—ñ–¥–º—ñ–Ω—É –≤—ñ–¥ —É–∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω—Å—å–∫–æ—ó, –Ω–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫–∞ –º–∞—î **—Ç–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ñ –ø—ñ–¥–π–æ–º–∏** ‚Äî –∫–æ–ª–∏ –≥–æ–ª–æ—Å –ø—ñ–¥–Ω—ñ–º–∞—î—Ç—å—Å—è —á–∏ –æ–ø—É—Å–∫–∞—î—Ç—å—Å—è, –∑–º—ñ–Ω—é—é—á–∏ –∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–Ω—è —Å–ª—ñ–≤. –¶–µ —è–∫ –º—É–∑–∏–∫–∞ –ª—é–±–æ–≤—ñ, —è–∫—É –≤–∏ —Å—Ç–≤–æ—Ä—é—î—Ç–µ —Ä–∞–∑–æ–º!

### –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∏ –Ω–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫–æ–≥–æ –∑–≤—É–∫–æ—Ä—è–¥—É

<VocabCard
  word="Kj√¶rlighet"
  translation="–ö–æ—Ö–∞–Ω–Ω—è"
  pronunciation="SHEHR-lee-het"
  example="Kj√¶rlighet er viktig i et forhold."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Klem"
  translation="–û–±—ñ–π–º–∏"
  pronunciation="klem"
  example="Gi meg en klem!"
/>

## –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ñ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª–∞ –≤–∏–º–æ–≤–∏ –¥–ª—è –∑–∞–∫–æ—Ö–∞–Ω–∏—Ö

### 1. **–ú'—è–∫—ñ –ø—Ä–∏–≥–æ–ª–æ—Å–Ω—ñ** ‚Äî —Å–µ–∫—Ä–µ—Ç –Ω—ñ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—ñ
–ù–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫—ñ **kj-** —Ç–∞ **sj-** –∑–≤—É–∫–∏ —Å—Ç–≤–æ—Ä—é—é—Ç—å –º'—è–∫—ñ—Å—Ç—å —É –º–æ–≤—ñ. –ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫—É–π—Ç–µ —Ä–∞–∑–æ–º:

- **Kj√¶re** (–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≥–∏–π/–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≥–∞) ‚Äî –≤–∏–º–æ–≤–ª—è–π—Ç–µ "SHEH-reh"
- **Kj√∏kken** (–∫—É—Ö–Ω—è) ‚Äî "SHEW-ken"

### 2. **–†olling R** ‚Äî –º—É–∑–∏–∫–∞ –º–æ–≤–∏
–ù–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫–µ **R** –∫–æ—Ç–∏—Ç—å—Å—è, —è–∫ —ñ—Ç–∞–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–µ. –¶–µ –¥–æ–¥–∞—î –ø—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—å –≤–∞—à–∏–º —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞–º:
- **Er** (—î) ‚Äî –≤–∏–º–æ–≤–ª—è–π—Ç–µ –∑ –ª–µ–≥–∫–∏–º –∫–æ—Ç—ñ–Ω–Ω—è–º —è–∑–∏–∫–∞
- **Kj√¶r** (–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≥–∏–π) ‚Äî "SHEHR"

### 3. **–ì–æ–ª–æ—Å–Ω—ñ –∑ –∫—Ä–∞–ø–∫–∞–º–∏** ‚Äî –æ—Å–æ–±–ª–∏–≤—ñ –∑–≤—É–∫–∏ –ª—é–±–æ–≤—ñ
–ù–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫—ñ –≥–æ–ª–æ—Å–Ω—ñ **√¶, √∏, √•** ‚Äî —Ü–µ –≤–∞—à—ñ –Ω–æ–≤—ñ –Ω–∞–π–∫—Ä–∞—â—ñ –¥—Ä—É–∑—ñ:

| –õ—ñ—Ç–µ—Ä–∞ | –í–∏–º–æ–≤–∞ | –£–∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω—Å—å–∫–∏–π –µ–∫–≤—ñ–≤–∞–ª–µ–Ω—Ç | –ü—Ä–∏–∫–ª–∞–¥ |
|--------|---------|----------------------|---------|
| **√Ü** | —è–∫ "–µ" –≤ "–º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ" | –µ | **K√¶rlig** (–ª–∞—Å–∫–∞–≤–∏–π) |
| **√ò** | —è–∫ "–µ" –≤ "—Ç–µ–ø–µ—Ä" + –≥—É–±–∏ –≤–ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥ | –µ-—É | **√òye** (–æ–∫–æ) |
| **√Ö** | —è–∫ "–æ" –≤ "—Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–æ" | –æ | **√Ör** (—Ä—ñ–∫) |

<CultureTip flag="üá≥üá¥" title="–ù–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫–∏–π –∞–∫—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç = —à–∞—Ä–º">
–ù–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∂—Ü—ñ –æ–±–æ–∂–Ω—é—é—Ç—å, –∫–æ–ª–∏ —ñ–Ω–æ–∑–µ–º—Ü—ñ –Ω–∞–º–∞–≥–∞—é—Ç—å—Å—è –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–∏ —ó—Ö–Ω—å–æ—é –º–æ–≤–æ—é! –ù–∞–≤—ñ—Ç—å —è–∫—â–æ –≤–∞—à–∞ –≤–∏–º–æ–≤–∞ –Ω–µ —ñ–¥–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞, –≤–∞—à—ñ —Å–ø—Ä–æ–±–∏ –±—É–¥—É—Ç—å –≤–≤–∞–∂–∞—Ç–∏—Å—è —á–∞—Ä—ñ–≤–Ω–∏–º–∏. –í–∞—à –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä –±—É–¥–µ –ø–∏—à–∞—Ç–∏—Å—è –≤–∞–º–∏!
</CultureTip>

## –ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–Ω—ñ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏ –¥–ª—è –ø–∞—Ä: –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü—è –≤–∏–º–æ–≤–∏

| –ù–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∞ | –ü–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª–∞–¥ | –í–∏–º–æ–≤–∞ | –ü—Ä–∏–º—ñ—Ç–∫–∞ |
|------------------|----------|---------|----------|
| **God morgen, min kj√¶re** | –î–æ–±—Ä–∏–π —Ä–∞–Ω–æ–∫, –º—ñ–π –¥–æ—Ä–æ–≥–∏–π | goo MOR-gen min SHEH-reh | –†–∞–Ω–∫–æ–≤–∞ –Ω—ñ–∂–Ω—ñ—Å—Ç—å |
| **Jeg savner deg** | –Ø —Å—É–º—É—é –∑–∞ —Ç–æ–±–æ—é | YAI SAV-ner dai | –í–∏–º–æ–≤–ª—è–π—Ç–µ –º'—è–∫–æ |
| **Du er s√• vakker** | –¢–∏ —Ç–∞–∫–∞ –∫—Ä–∞—Å–∏–≤–∞ | doo er soh VAK-ker | R –∫–æ—Ç–∏—Ç—å—Å—è |
| **Skal vi kose oss?** | –•–æ—á–µ—à –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Å—Ç–∏ –ø—Ä–∏—î–º–Ω–æ —á–∞—Å? | shahl vee KOH-seh ohss | –ö–ª—é—á–æ–≤–µ –∑–∞–ø–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–±–∞—á–µ–Ω—å |
| **Jeg er glad i deg** | –Ø —Ç–µ–±–µ –ª—é–±–ª—é | YAI er glahd ee dai | –ê–ª—å—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–∞—Ç–∏–≤–∞ "elsker" |

## –ü–æ—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω—ñ –ø–æ–º–∏–ª–∫–∏, —è–∫–∏—Ö –≤–∞—Ä—Ç–æ —É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∏

### 1. **–ó–∞–Ω–∞–¥—Ç–æ —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω–µ "R"**
**–ù–µ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ:** "Jeg elska DEG" (—Ä—É—Å–∏—Ñ—ñ–∫–æ–≤–∞–Ω–µ R)
**–ü—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ:** "Jeg elsker deg" (YAI el-sher dai)

### 2. **–ü–ª—É—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è –≥–æ–ª–æ—Å–Ω–∏—Ö**
**–ù–µ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ:** "God morgen" (–≥—É–¥ –º–æ—Ä–≥–µ–Ω)
**–ü—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ:** "God morgen" (goo MOR-gen)

### 3. **–¢–∏—Å–∫ –Ω–∞ –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω—ñ —Å–∫–ª–∞–¥–∏**
**–ù–µ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ:** "KJ√Ürlighet"
**–ü—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ:** "Kj√¶rlighet" (SHEHR-lee-het)

## –¢—Ä–µ–Ω—É–≤–∞–ª—å–Ω—ñ —Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–Ω—è –¥–ª—è –ø–∞—Ä

–ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫—É–π—Ç–µ —Ü—ñ —Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–Ω—è —Ä–∞–∑–æ–º, –∑–∞–ø–∏—Å—É–π—Ç–µ —Å–µ–±–µ –Ω–∞ —Ç–µ–ª–µ—Ñ–æ–Ω —ñ —Å–ª—É—Ö–∞–π—Ç–µ:

1. **"Hvordan har du det, min kj√¶re?"** (–íOR-dahn hahr doo deh, min SHEH-reh?) ‚Äî –Ø–∫ —Ç–∏ —Å–µ–±–µ –ø–æ—á—É–≤–∞—î—à, –º—ñ–π –¥–æ—Ä–æ–≥–∏–π?
2. **"Skal vi lage middag sammen?"** (shahl vee LAH-geh MID-dahg SAH-men?) ‚Äî –•–æ—á–µ—à –ø—Ä–∏–≥–æ—Ç—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏ –≤–µ—á–µ—Ä—é —Ä–∞–∑–æ–º?
3. **"Du gj√∏r meg s√• lykkelig"** (doo YURR mai soh LUK-keh-lee) ‚Äî –¢–∏ —Ä–æ–±–∏—à –º–µ–Ω–µ —Ç–∞–∫–∏–º —â–∞—Å–ª–∏–≤–∏–º
4. **"Jeg vil v√¶re sammen med deg alltid"** (YAI vihl VEH-reh SAH-men med dai AHL-lee-dee) ‚Äî –Ø —Ö–æ—á—É –±—É—Ç–∏ –∑ —Ç–æ–±–æ—é –∑–∞–≤–∂–¥–∏
5. **"Tusen takk for at du er i mitt liv"** (TOO-sen tahk for aht doo er ee mitt leev) ‚Äî –¢–∏—Å—è—á–∞ –ø–æ–¥—è–∫, —â–æ —Ç–∏ –≤ –º–æ—î–º—É –∂–∏—Ç—Ç—ñ
6. **"Du er min st√∏rste kj√¶rlighet"** (doo er min STUR-steh SHEHR-lee-het) ‚Äî –¢–∏ –º–æ—è –Ω–∞–π–±—ñ–ª—å—à–∞ –ª—é–±–æ–≤
7. **"Kan jeg f√• en klem?"** (kahn YAI foh en klem?) ‚Äî –ú–æ–∂—É —è –æ—Ç—Ä–∏–º–∞—Ç–∏ –æ–±—ñ–π–º–∏?

<CultureTip flag="üá≥üá¥" title="–ù–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫–∏–π —Ä–∏—Ç–º = —Ä–∏—Ç–º –ª—é–±–æ–≤—ñ">
–ù–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫–∞ –º–æ–≤–∞ –º–∞—î "musikalsk" (–º—É–∑–∏—á–Ω–∏–π) —Ä–∏—Ç–º. –ö–æ–ª–∏ –≤–∏ –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ –∑ –≤–∞—à–∏–º –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–º, —É—è–≤—ñ—Ç—å, —â–æ —Å–ø—ñ–≤–∞—î—Ç–µ –ª–∞–≥—ñ–¥–Ω—É –ø—ñ—Å–Ω—é. –¶–µ –¥–æ–ø–æ–º–æ–∂–µ –∑ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ—é —ñ–Ω—Ç–æ–Ω–∞—Ü—ñ—î—é!
</CultureTip>

## –®–≤–∏–¥–∫–∞ –¥–æ–≤—ñ–¥–∫–∞: –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ñ –∑–≤—É–∫–∏ –ª—é–±–æ–≤—ñ

–ó–±–µ—Ä–µ–∂—ñ—Ç—å —Ü—é —Ç–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü—é –¥–ª—è —à–≤–∏–¥–∫–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—è:

| –ó–≤—É–∫ | –Ø–∫ –≤–∏–º–æ–≤–ª—è—Ç–∏ | –ü—Ä–∏–∫–ª–∞–¥ | –£ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç—ñ |
|------|---------------|---------|-------------|
| **Kj-** | —è–∫ "—â" –º'—è–∫–µ | Kj√¶re | "Min kj√¶re" (–º—ñ–π –¥–æ—Ä–æ–≥–∏–π) |
| **Sj-** | —è–∫ "—à" | Sjenert | "Jeg er sjenert" (—è —Å–æ—Ä–æ–º'—è–∑–ª–∏–≤–∏–π) |
| **R** | –∫–æ—Ç–∏—Ç—å—Å—è | Er | "Jeg er glad" (—è —â–∞—Å–ª–∏–≤–∏–π) |
| **√Ü** | —è–∫ "–µ" | K√¶rlighet | "V√•r kj√¶rlighet" (–Ω–∞—à–∞ –ª—é–±–æ–≤) |
| **√ò** | –µ-—É | √ònske | "Jeg √∏nsker deg" (—è –±–∞–∂–∞—é —Ç–æ–±—ñ) |
| **√Ö** | —è–∫ "–æ" | √Ör | "I √•r" (—Ü—å–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ–∫—É) |

## –©–æ –¥–∞–ª—ñ? –í–∞—à —à–ª—è—Ö –¥–æ –¥–æ—Å–∫–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ—Å—Ç—ñ

–ú–∏ —Ç—ñ–ª—å–∫–∏ —â–æ —Ä–æ–∑–∫—Ä–∏–ª–∏ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∏ –Ω–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫–æ—ó –≤–∏–º–æ–≤–∏! –ü—Ä–æ–¥–æ–≤–∂—É–π—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏ –∑ –≤–∞—à–∏–º –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–º –∫–æ–∂–Ω–æ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è. –ù–∞—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ñ –∫—Ä–æ–∫–∏:

- –í–∏–≤—á—ñ—Ç—å [–Ω–æ—Ä–≤–µ–∑—å–∫—ñ –∫–æ–º–ø–ª—ñ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∏ –¥–ª—è –≤–∞—à–æ—ó –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–∫–∏](/learn/uk/no/romantic-norwegian-phrases-for-every-occasion/)
- –ü—ñ–¥–≥–æ—Ç—É–π—Ç–µ—Å—è –¥–æ [–∑–Ω–∞–π–æ–º—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∑ —Ä–æ–¥–∏–Ω–æ—é](/learn/uk/no/meeting-your-partner-s-family/)
- –û—Å–≤–æ–π—Ç–µ [–Ω—ñ—á–Ω—ñ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–±–∞—á–µ–Ω—å](/learn/uk/no/norwegian-date-night-vocabulary/)

–ü–∞–º'—è—Ç–∞–π—Ç–µ: –∫–æ—Ö–∞–Ω–Ω—è ‚Äî —Ü–µ –Ω–∞–π–∫—Ä–∞—â–∏–π –º–æ—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ç–æ—Ä –¥–ª—è –≤–∏–≤—á–µ–Ω–Ω—è –º–æ–≤–∏. –ö–æ–∂–Ω–µ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ –≤–∏–º–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–µ —Å–ª–æ–≤–æ –Ω–∞–±–ª–∏–∂–∞—î –≤–∞—Å –¥–æ —Å–µ—Ä—Ü—è –≤–∞—à–æ–≥–æ –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–∞!

<CTA />

articles.title: Godmorgen og Godnat p√• Tjekkisk: S√∏de Fraser til Din Partner
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

De f√∏rste og sidste ord p√• dagen er magiske. En s√∏d godmorgen p√• tjekkisk kan starte dagen perfekt, og en k√¶rlig godnat sikrer s√∏de dr√∏mme. Kombiner med vores [tjekkiske k√¶lenavne](/learn/da/cs/czech-pet-names-and-endearments/)!

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Good morning, my love"
  translation="Godmorgen, min elskede"
  pronunciation="gud mor-ning mai lav"
  context="Start dagen med k√¶rlighed"
/>

## Godmorgen Fraser

<VocabCard
  word="Good morning"
  translation="Godmorgen"
  pronunciation="gud mor-ning"
  example="Good morning, sweetheart!"
/>

| Tjekkisk | Dansk | Udtale |
|---------|-------|--------|
| **Good morning** | Godmorgen | gud mor-ning |
| **Good morning, my love** | Godmorgen, min elskede | gud mor-ning mai lav |
| **Did you sleep well?** | Har du sovet godt? | did juu sliip wel? |
| **What a beautiful morning** | Sikke en smuk morgen | wot uh byu-ti-ful mor-ning |
| **Rise and shine!** | Op og hoppe! | raiz and shain! |

### S√∏de Morgenhilsner

- **Did you dream of me?** (Har du dr√∏mt om mig?) - "did juu driim ov mi?"
- **You're my first thought** (Du er min f√∏rste tanke) - "joor mai furst thot"
- **Coffee, darling?** (Kaffe, skat?) - "ko-fi, dar-ling?"
- **Good morning, sunshine** (Godmorgen, solskin) - "gud mor-ning, sun-shain"

<CultureTip flag="üá®üáø" title="Morgenkultur">
Engl√¶ndere starter ofte dagen med 'a cuppa' - perfekt tidspunkt for en k√¶rlig besked.
</CultureTip>

## Morgenmotivation

- **Have a good day** (Hav en god dag) - "hav uh gud dei"
- **You'll do great** (Du vil klare det fantastisk) - "juul duu greit"
- **I'm proud of you** (Jeg er stolt af dig) - "aim praud ov juu"
- **Good luck today** (Held og lykke i dag) - "gud lak tuh-dei"

## I L√∏bet af Dagen

<VocabCard
  word="Thinking of you"
  translation="Jeg t√¶nker p√• dig"
  pronunciation="thing-king ov juu"
  example="Just thinking of you."
/>

| Tjekkisk | Dansk | Hvorn√•r |
|---------|-------|---------|
| **Thinking of you** | Jeg t√¶nker p√• dig | Midt p√• dagen |
| **I miss you** | Jeg savner dig | N√•r adskilt |
| **How's your day going?** | Hvordan g√•r din dag? | Eftermiddag |
| **See you soon** | Vi ses snart | F√∏r genforening |

## Godaften Fraser

- **Good evening** (Godaften) - "gud iiv-ning"
- **Finally home** (Endelig hjemme) - "fai-na-li houm"
- **I missed you** (Jeg har savnet dig) - "ai mist juu"
- **How was your day?** (Hvordan var din dag?) - "hau woz joor dei?"

## Godnat Fraser

<VocabCard
  word="Good night"
  translation="Godnat"
  pronunciation="gud nait"
  example="Good night, sleep tight."
/>

| Tjekkisk | Dansk | Udtale |
|---------|-------|--------|
| **Good night** | Godnat | gud nait |
| **Good night, my love** | Godnat, min elskede | gud nait mai lav |
| **Sweet dreams** | S√∏de dr√∏mme | swiit driimz |
| **Sleep tight** | Sov godt | sliip tait |
| **See you tomorrow** | Vi ses i morgen | sii juu tuh-mo-rou |

### Romantiske Godnat-beskeder

- **You're my last thought** (Du er min sidste tanke) - "joor mai last thot"
- **Dream of me** (Dr√∏m om mig) - "driim ov mi"
- **A goodnight kiss** (Et godnat-kys) - "uh gud-nait kis"
- **I love you, goodnight** (Jeg elsker dig, godnat) - "ai lav juu gud-nait"

<CultureTip flag="üá®üáø" title="Godnat-traditioner">
Et godnat-kys og 'I love you' er den perfekte afslutning p√• dagen.
</CultureTip>

## S√∏vnrelaterede Fraser

| Tjekkisk | Dansk | Udtale |
|---------|-------|--------|
| **I'm tired** | Jeg er tr√¶t | aim tai-urd |
| **I'm sleepy** | Jeg er s√∏vnig | aim slii-pi |
| **I can't sleep** | Jeg kan ikke sove | ai kant sliip |
| **I had a nightmare** | Jeg havde mareridt | ai had uh nait-mehr |
| **Let's take a nap** | Lad os tage en lur | lets teik uh nap |

## Weekend Morgen

- **Let's stay in bed** (Lad os blive i sengen) - "lets stei in bed"
- **A lazy morning** (En doven morgen) - "uh lei-zi mor-ning"
- **Shall we brunch?** (Skal vi brunche?) - "shal wii brunch?"
- **Come cuddle** (Kom og kram) - "kum ku-dul"

## Tekstbeskeder

### Morgenbeskeder
- **Good morning, sweetheart üíï** (Godmorgen, skat üíï)
- **Hope you have an amazing day** (H√•ber du har en fantastisk dag)
- **Thinking of you** (T√¶nker p√• dig)

### Aftenbeskeder
- **Looking forward to seeing you** (Gl√¶der mig til at se dig)
- **Almost home** (Snart hjemme)
- **Goodnight, sweet dreams üåô** (Godnat, dr√∏m s√∏dt üåô)

## Tips til Daglige Ritualer

1. **V√¶r konsekvent** - G√∏r det til en vane
2. **Varier fraserne** - Brug forskellige hver dag
3. **Tilf√∏j k√¶lenavne** - Det g√∏r det personligt
4. **Send beskeder** - N√•r I er adskilt
5. **V√¶r oprigtig** - Sig det med f√∏lelse

For flere romantiske fraser, se [tjekkiske romantiske fraser](/learn/da/cs/czech-romantic-phrases-for-every-occasion/).

Disse daglige tjekkiske ritualer er sm√• k√¶rlighedserkl√¶ringer.

<CTA />

articles.title: Leh√ße Sevgi S√∂zc√ºkleri ve Takma Adlar
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';

# Leh√ße Sevgi S√∂zc√ºkleri ve Takma Adlar

Sevgi s√∂zc√ºkleri, partnerinize onun sizin i√ßin ne kadar √∂nemli olduƒüunu g√∂stermenin harika bir yoludur. Partneriniz Leh√ße konu≈üuyorsa, bu sevgi dolu ifadeleri kullandƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ±zda mutlu olacaktƒ±r!

## Sevgi S√∂zc√ºkleri Neden √ñnemli?

Sevgi s√∂zc√ºkleri yakƒ±nlƒ±k yaratƒ±r ve sevgi g√∂sterir. ƒ∞ki ki≈üi arasƒ±nda √∂zel bir baƒü gibidir ‚Äì sadece ikinize ait √∂zel bir ≈üey.

## Klasik Sevgi S√∂zc√ºkleri

Zamansƒ±z klasikler her dilde i≈üe yarar:

- **Tatlƒ±m** - evrensel favori
- **Canƒ±m** - klasik ve zarif
- **Kalbim** - duygusal ve ≈üiirsel
- **A≈ükƒ±m** - romantik ve nazik

<CultureTip>
Sevgi s√∂zc√ºkleri genellikle b√∂lgeden b√∂lgeye deƒüi≈üir. Bir yerde yaygƒ±n olan, ba≈üka bir yerde alƒ±≈üƒ±lmadƒ±k gelebilir. Partnerinize memleketinde hangi isimlerin kullanƒ±ldƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ± sorun!
</CultureTip>

## Tatlƒ± Hayvan ƒ∞simleri

Bir√ßok k√ºlt√ºrde olduƒüu gibi, Leh√ßede de hayvan isimleri sevgiyle kullanƒ±lƒ±r:

- **Ayƒ±cƒ±ƒüƒ±m** - sevimli ve g√º√ßl√º
- **Faremin** - tatlƒ± ve minno≈ü
- **Tav≈üanƒ±m** - ≈üefkatli
- **Ku≈üum** - sevgi dolu

## Romantik ƒ∞fadeler

√ñzel anlar i√ßin:

- **Bir tanem** - biri sizin i√ßin her ≈üey olduƒüunda
- **Ruh e≈üim** - derin baƒülantƒ±lar i√ßin
- **G√ºne≈üim** - hayatƒ±nƒ±zƒ± aydƒ±nlatan biri i√ßin

## Farklƒ± Durumlar ƒ∞√ßin Sevgi S√∂zc√ºkleri

### G√ºnl√ºk Hayatta
G√ºnl√ºk kullanƒ±m i√ßin kƒ±sa, rahat isimler. Hƒ±zlƒ± bir "Selam, tatlƒ±m!" her zaman i≈üe yarar.

### Romantik Anlar ƒ∞√ßin
Daha uzun, daha duygusal ifadeler √∂zel anlara yakƒ±≈üƒ±r. Partnerinize onun sizin i√ßin ne ifade ettiƒüini s√∂yleyin.

### ≈ûakala≈ümak ƒ∞√ßin
Esprili sevgi s√∂zc√ºkleri ili≈ükinizi renklendirebilir ‚Äì ama partnerinizin bu espriyi payla≈ütƒ±ƒüƒ±ndan emin olun!

## Kullanƒ±m ƒ∞pu√ßlarƒ±

1. **Partnerinize sorun**: Herkes her sevgi s√∂zc√ºƒü√ºn√º sevmez. Neyi sevdiƒüini sorun.
2. **Telaffuza dikkat edin**: Doƒüru telaffuzu √∂ƒürenin ‚Äì doƒüru s√∂ylenen bir sevgi s√∂zc√ºƒü√ºnden daha romantik bir ≈üey yok.
3. **Samimi olun**: Size ve √ßift olarak size uyan isimleri kullanƒ±n.
4. **Kendi isimlerinizi yaratƒ±n**: En ki≈üisel sevgi s√∂zc√ºkleri genellikle kendiniz uydurduklarƒ±nƒ±zdƒ±r!
5. **Tepkiyi izleyin**: En iyi sevgi s√∂zc√ºƒü√º, partnerinizi g√ºl√ºmseten s√∂zc√ºkt√ºr.

## Dilin G√ºc√º

Sevgi s√∂zc√ºkleri kelimelerden fazlasƒ±dƒ±r ‚Äì g√ºnl√ºk hayatta k√º√ß√ºk a≈ük itiraflarƒ±dƒ±r. Partnerinizle ileti≈üim kurmak i√ßin Leh√ße √∂ƒüreniyorsanƒ±z, sevgi s√∂zc√ºkleri harika bir ba≈ülangƒ±√ßtƒ±r.

articles.title: Phrases russes sur le pardon en couple
articles.content:
Le pardon est un √©l√©ment profond de la culture russe et des relations amoureuses. Avec un partenaire russophone, ces expressions vous aideront √† naviguer ces moments avec authenticit√©.

## Le pardon dans la culture russe

Les Russes vivent leurs √©motions intens√©ment. Le pardon est un acte significatif qui implique souvent des larmes, des √©treintes et une sinc√©rit√© profonde.

## Expressions pour demander pardon

### S'excuser sinc√®rement

**"–ü—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –º–µ–Ω—è, –ø–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, –∑–∞ —Ç–æ, —á—Ç–æ —è —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞–ª/–∞."** (Prosti menya, pozhaluysta, za to, chto ya sdelal/a)
*Pardonne-moi, s'il te pla√Æt, pour ce que j'ai fait.*

**"–Ø –±—ã–ª/–∞ –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–∞–≤/–∞ –∏ –≥–ª—É–±–æ–∫–æ —Å–æ–∂–∞–ª–µ—é."** (Ya byl/a neprav/a i gluboko sozhaleyu)
*J'avais tort et je le regrette profond√©ment.*

**"–ù–µ—Ç –æ–ø—Ä–∞–≤–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –º–æ–µ–º—É –ø–æ–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—é."** (Net opravdaniya moyemu povedeniyu)
*Il n'y a pas d'excuse pour mon comportement.*

### Exprimer ses regrets

**"–Ø –Ω–∏–∫–æ–≥–¥–∞ –Ω–µ —Ö–æ—Ç–µ–ª/–∞ —Ç–µ–±—è –æ–±–∏–¥–µ—Ç—å."** (Ya nikogda ne khotel/a tebya obidet)
*Je n'ai jamais voulu te blesser.*

**"–ï—Å–ª–∏ –±—ã —è –º–æ–≥/–º–æ–≥–ª–∞ –≤–µ—Ä–Ω—É—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞–∑–∞–¥, —è –±—ã —ç—Ç–æ —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞–ª/–∞."** (Yesli by ya mog/mogla vernutsya nazad, ya by eto sdelal/a)
*Si je pouvais revenir en arri√®re, je le ferais.*

### S'engager √† changer

**"–û–±–µ—â–∞—é, —á—Ç–æ –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω—é—Å—å."** (Obeshchayu, chto izmenyus)
*Je promets que je changerai.*

**"–Ø –±—É–¥—É —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞–¥ —Å–æ–±–æ–π."** (Ya budu rabotat nad soboy)
*Je vais travailler sur moi-m√™me.*

## Expressions pour pardonner

### Accorder le pardon

**"–Ø —Ç–µ–±—è –ø—Ä–æ—â–∞—é."** (Ya tebya proshchayu)
*Je te pardonne.*

**"–í—Å–µ –æ—à–∏–±–∞—é—Ç—Å—è. –Ø –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞—é."** (Vse oshibayutsya. Ya ponimayu)
*Tout le monde fait des erreurs. Je comprends.*

**"–î–∞–≤–∞–π –æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏–º —ç—Ç–æ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ—à–ª–æ–º."** (Davay ostavim eto v proshlom)
*Laissons cela dans le pass√©.*

### Exprimer la r√©conciliation

**"–Ø –Ω–µ —Ö–æ—á—É, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —ç—Ç–æ –Ω–∞—Å —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–∏–ª–æ."** (Ya ne khochu, chtoby eto nas razdelilo)
*Je ne veux pas que cela nous s√©pare.*

**"–ì–ª–∞–≤–Ω–æ–µ ‚Äî –∏–¥—Ç–∏ –≤–ø–µ—Ä—ë–¥ –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ."** (Glavnoye ‚Äî idti vperyod vmeste)
*L'important est d'avancer ensemble.*

## L'√¢me russe et le pardon

Le pardon russe est profond et √©motionnel. Il peut √™tre accompagn√© de larmes de soulagement et d'√©treintes chaleureuses.

## Conclusion

Le pardon avec un partenaire russe est un moment d'intimit√© profonde. Soyez sinc√®re et n'ayez pas peur de montrer vos √©motions.

articles.title: Cum SƒÉ Ceri √Æn CƒÉsƒÉtorie: Expresii pentru LogodnƒÉ √Æn GreacƒÉ
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Cererea √Æn cƒÉsƒÉtorie este unul dintre momentele cele mai importante din via»õa unui cuplu. Acest ghid te va ajuta sƒÉ exprimi sentimentele tale √Æn limba partenerului tƒÉu.

Pentru expresii romantice de bazƒÉ, consultƒÉ ghidul nostru de [expresii romantice pentru fiecare ocazie](/learn/ro/el/el-romantic-phrases-for-every-occasion).

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Vrei sƒÉ te cƒÉsƒÉtore»ôti cu mine?"
  translation="√éntrebarea magicƒÉ"
  pronunciation="vezi ghidul complet"
  context="Cea mai importantƒÉ √Æntrebare pe care o vei pune vreodatƒÉ."
/>

## Vocabular Esen»õial pentru Cererea √Æn CƒÉsƒÉtorie

√énainte de a pune marea √Æntrebare, este important sƒÉ cuno»ôti vocabularul de bazƒÉ:

<VocabCard
  word="cerere √Æn cƒÉsƒÉtorie"
  translation="proposal"
  pronunciation="propunere romanticƒÉ"
  example="Am planificat cererea perfectƒÉ."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="logodnƒÉ"
  translation="engagement"
  pronunciation="angajament romantic"
  example="Logodna noastrƒÉ a fost perfectƒÉ."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="inel de logodnƒÉ"
  translation="engagement ring"
  pronunciation="simbol al iubirii"
  example="Inelul strƒÉluce»ôte frumos."
/>

### Termeni Fundamentali

| Termen | Traducere | Utilizare |
|--------|-----------|----------|
| a cere √Æn cƒÉsƒÉtorie | to propose | Actul de a pune √Æntrebarea |
| logodnic/logodnicƒÉ | fianc√©/fianc√©e | Partenerul dupƒÉ logodnƒÉ |
| a se logodi | to get engaged | Momentul acceptƒÉrii |
| inelul de logodnƒÉ | engagement ring | Simbolul promisiunii |
| diamant | diamond | Piatra tradi»õionalƒÉ |
| aur | gold | Metalul clasic |

<CultureTip flag="üåç" title="Tradi»õii Culturale">
Fiecare culturƒÉ are propriile tradi»õii pentru cererea √Æn cƒÉsƒÉtorie. Unele implicƒÉ cererea permisiunii pƒÉrin»õilor, altele includ gesturi romantice elaborate. √én»õelegerea tradi»õiilor partenerului tƒÉu poate face momentul »ôi mai special.
</CultureTip>

## Fraze pentru Cererea √Æn CƒÉsƒÉtorie

IatƒÉ expresiile cele mai romantice pentru acest moment special:

### √éntrebƒÉrile Clasice
- **Vrei sƒÉ te cƒÉsƒÉtore»ôti cu mine?** - √éntrebarea tradi»õionalƒÉ
- **√émi faci onoarea de a-mi fi so»õie/so»õ?** - FormalƒÉ »ôi elegantƒÉ
- **Vreau sƒÉ-mi petrec restul vie»õii cu tine** - Declara»õie de inten»õie
- **Te iubesc mai mult dec√¢t orice. Vei fi a mea/al meu pentru totdeauna?** - RomanticƒÉ

### Introduceri Emo»õionante
- **Din momentul √Æn care te-am √Ænt√¢lnit, am »ôtiut cƒÉ e»ôti special/ƒÉ...**
- **Ai schimbat via»õa mea √Æn moduri pe care nu le-am crezut posibile...**
- **Cu tine, am descoperit ce √ÆnseamnƒÉ adevƒÉrata fericire...**
- **Fiecare zi alƒÉturi de tine este un dar...**

<VocabCard
  word="A spus DA!"
  translation="She/He said YES!"
  pronunciation="Momentul fericirii supreme"
  example="Nu-mi vine sƒÉ cred, a spus da!"
/>

## RƒÉspunsuri la Cerere

### RƒÉspunsuri Pozitive
| RƒÉspuns | Emo»õie | Context |
|---------|--------|--------|
| Da! | Bucurie purƒÉ | Simplu »ôi direct |
| Bine√Æn»õeles! | Certitudine | FƒÉrƒÉ ezitare |
| De o mie de ori da! | Extaz | Foarte entuziast |
| Am a»ôteptat acest moment! | Anticipare | Romantic |

<CultureTip flag="üíç" title="Alegerea Inelului">
Tradi»õia inelului de logodnƒÉ cu diamant a devenit popularƒÉ √Æn secolul XX. AstƒÉzi, multe cupluri aleg pietre alternative sau inele de familie cu valoare sentimentalƒÉ. Cel mai important este semnifica»õia, nu pre»õul.
</CultureTip>

## Vocabular pentru Inele

### Pietre Pre»õioase
| PiatrƒÉ | Semnifica»õie |
|--------|-------------|
| Diamant | Ve»ônicie, puritate |
| Safir | Fidelitate, sinceritate |
| Rubin | Pasiune, dragoste |
| Smarald | Speran»õƒÉ, re√Ænnoire |

### Metale
| Metal | Caracteristici |
|-------|---------------|
| Aur galben | Clasic, tradi»õional |
| Aur alb | Modern, elegant |
| PlatinƒÉ | Durabil, rar |
| Aur roz | Romantic, contemporan |

## Anun»õul Logodnei

<VocabCard
  word="Suntem logodi»õi!"
  translation="We're engaged!"
  pronunciation="Vestea cea mare"
  example="Avem ve»ôti minunate - suntem logodi»õi!"
/>

### Cum SƒÉ Anun»õi
- **Familiei √Æn persoanƒÉ** - Cele mai apropiate persoane meritƒÉ sƒÉ afle primele
- **Prietenilor apropia»õi** - DupƒÉ familie
- **Pe re»õelele sociale** - Pentru cercul mai larg
- **Formal, prin anun»õ** - √én unele culturi, tradi»õie

### Expresii pentru Anun»õ
- **Avem ve»ôti minunate de √ÆmpƒÉrtƒÉ»ôit!**
- **Ne pregƒÉtim pentru o nouƒÉ aventurƒÉ √ÆmpreunƒÉ!**
- **A √Ænceput numƒÉrƒÉtoarea inversƒÉ spre ziua cea mare!**
- **Din logodnici devenim parteneri de via»õƒÉ!**

## DupƒÉ LogodnƒÉ

### Pa»ôii UrmƒÉtori
| Pas | Descriere |
|-----|----------|
| Petrecerea de logodnƒÉ | Celebrarea cu cei dragi |
| Alegerea datei | Stabilirea zilei nun»õii |
| Planificarea nun»õii | √énceputul organizƒÉrii |
| Anun»õurile oficiale | Invita»õiile »ôi comunicarea |

## FelicitƒÉri pentru Logodi»õi

C√¢nd cineva √Æ»õi spune cƒÉ s-a logodit:

- **FelicitƒÉri! Sunt at√¢t de fericit/ƒÉ pentru voi!**
- **Ce veste minunatƒÉ! Forma»õi un cuplu perfect!**
- **VƒÉ doresc toatƒÉ fericirea din lume!**
- **C√¢nd e ziua cea mare?**
- **Vreau sƒÉ vƒÉd inelul!**

## Sfaturi Practice

1. **PlanificƒÉ momentul** - Alege un loc »ôi timp special
2. **PracticƒÉ ce vrei sƒÉ spui** - Emo»õiile pot fi cople»ôitoare
3. **Fii sincer** - Cuvintele din inimƒÉ sunt cele mai puternice
4. **Nu te grƒÉbi** - SavureazƒÉ momentul
5. **FotografiazƒÉ/filmeazƒÉ** - DacƒÉ e posibil, pentru amintire

<CTA />

## Concluzie

Cererea √Æn cƒÉsƒÉtorie este un moment unic »ôi special. Indiferent de limbƒÉ sau culturƒÉ, cel mai important este sentimentul autentic care stƒÉ √Æn spatele cuvintelor. Cu pregƒÉtire »ôi sinceritate, vei crea o amintire de neuitat.

Mult succes »ôi fie ca rƒÉspunsul sƒÉ fie DA!
